com.nordicid.nurapi

Class NurBroadcast

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nordicid.nurapi.NurBroadcast

  • public class NurBroadcast
extends java.lang.Object
    NUR broadcast message.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int bc_cmd
      Command of this filter GET_INFO, GET_ETHCONFIG, SET_ETHCONFIG, BEEP, SETGPIO, GETGPIO.
      int bc_company
      Company ID 0xfe.
      byte[] bc_data
      Command data.
      int bc_devtype
      Device type ID (0x2 = All Nordic ID devices).
      int bc_len
      Command data length.
      int bc_tag
      0xff = message from host to device.
      byte[] f_data
      Filter data 16 bytes.
      int f_op
      Filter operator 1='>' 2='<' 3='=' 4'#'.
      int f_type
      Filter type: 0 = No filter, 1 = MAC, 2 = IP, 3 = STATUS, 4 = VERSION, 5 = SERVERPORT, 6 = ADDRTYPE.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NurBroadcast() 
      NurBroadcast(int bc_tag, int bc_devtype, int bc_company, int f_type, int f_op, byte[] f_data, int bc_cmd, int bc_len, byte[] bc_data)
      Constructor for the device search broadcast message.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • bc_tag

        public int bc_tag
        0xff = message from host to device. 0xfe = message from device to host.

      • bc_devtype

        public int bc_devtype
        Device type ID (0x2 = All Nordic ID devices).

      • bc_company

        public int bc_company
        Company ID 0xfe.

      • f_type

        public int f_type
        Filter type: 0 = No filter, 1 = MAC, 2 = IP, 3 = STATUS, 4 = VERSION, 5 = SERVERPORT, 6 = ADDRTYPE.

      • f_op

        public int f_op
        Filter operator 1='>' 2='<' 3='=' 4'#'.

      • f_data

        public byte[] f_data
        Filter data 16 bytes.

      • bc_cmd

        public int bc_cmd
        Command of this filter GET_INFO, GET_ETHCONFIG, SET_ETHCONFIG, BEEP, SETGPIO, GETGPIO.

      • bc_len

        public int bc_len
        Command data length.

      • bc_data

        public byte[] bc_data
        Command data.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NurBroadcast

        public NurBroadcast(int bc_tag,
                    int bc_devtype,
                    int bc_company,
                    int f_type,
                    int f_op,
                    byte[] f_data,
                    int bc_cmd,
                    int bc_len,
                    byte[] bc_data)
        Constructor for the device search broadcast message. Used internally by the API, do not use!
        Parameters:
        bc_tag - Message tag.
        bc_devtype - Type of the device.
        bc_company - Company / manufacturer.
        f_type - Type filter.
        f_op - Operation filter.
        f_data - Data filter.
        bc_cmd - Broadcast command.
        bc_len - Broadcast length.
        bc_data - Broadcast data.

        public NurBroadcast()
